dct_description_sm: Title ROMA on banderole at upper left, above compass giving orientation with north at left. Arms of city of Rome at upper right. Tempesta's name as draughtsman and Merian's as etcher at lower right. Relief conveyed pictorially.
dct_publisher_sm: [Frankfurt am Main, M. Merian, between 1640 and 1688]
